snippet: Daniel Suarez has proven to be a quick learner in a race car, winning in the eighth race of last year's NASCAR's K&N Pro Series East Tour and finishing third in the final standings....

headline.print_headline: Suarez to Make Nationwide Debut at Richmond
headline.main: Suarez to Make Nationwide Debut at Richmond

lead_paragraph: Daniel Suarez has proven to be a quick learner in a race car, winning in the eighth race of last year's NASCAR's K&N Pro Series East Tour and finishing third in the final standings.
